title: Finding Romeo
description: Finding Romeo is gritty and dares to go where most Christian Romance novels won't. Real life romance with characters that face real life circumstances. Nobody is perfect, not even those who make an effort to live like Christ. Author Joana James brings this sentiment to life in this one.Lies, betrayal and deceit. That's what Daynia gets when all she really wants is her Romeo, a Prince Charming to save her from the dead end she calls her life. When Richard rides in, she's convinced that he's the one. If only...Richard is haunted by his own past and finds Daynia to be a welcomed distraction. When ex-girlfriend Kayla returns to claim her beau, Richard is left with a decision that he is unwilling to make.Â How much is a girl willing to take before she realizes that her dream Romeo is really a nightmare?
author: Joana James
